name: Kana Quiz
description:
Includes all 46 Basic, 25 Voiced, and 33 Combo for both Hiragana and Katakana.

If you don't know the answer, just press enter to submit a blank answer to see the correct answer and it won't count as a miss.

New Dark Mode theme addon: swap the style.css

New scrolling background theme addon: swap the style.css
